8. Principal module¶

Python 3.5 implementation of the modular arbitrary-order ocean-atmosphere model MAOOAM This module actually contains the Heun algorithm routines.

Note

The python code is available here : https://github.com/nansencenter/DAPPER/tree/max1/mods/MAOOAM

Example:

>>>from maooam import *

8.1. Global variable¶

ic.X0 ic.X1 X t t_trans,t_run,tw,dt T

8.2. Dependencies¶

import numpy as np import params2 from params2 import ndim,tw,t_run,t_trans,dt import aotensor import integrator from plot import * import time import ic_def import ic
